6121.name: Double Edged Sword
description:
Melee: Deal 3% additional damage, take 1.5% additional damage.

Ranged: Deal and take 2% additional damage
sanitizedDescription: Melee: Deal 3% additional damage, take 1.5% additional damage. Ranged: Deal and take 2% additional damage

6261.name: Grasp of the Undying
description: Every 4 seconds in combat your next attack against an enemy champion steals life equal to 3% of your max Health (halved for ranged champions, deals magic damage)
sanitizedDescription: Every 4 seconds in combat your next attack against an enemy champion steals life equal to 3% of your max Health (halved for ranged champions, deals magic damage)

6122.name: Feast
description: Killing a unit restores 20 Health (20 second cooldown)
sanitizedDescription: Killing a unit restores 20 Health (20 second cooldown)

6141.name: Bounty Hunter
description: Deal 1% increased damage for each unique enemy champion you have killed
sanitizedDescription: Deal 1% increased damage for each unique enemy champion you have killed

6142.name: Oppressor
description: Deal 2.5% increased damage to targets with impaired movement (slow, stun, root, taunt, etc.)
sanitizedDescription: Deal 2.5% increased damage to targets with impaired movement (slow, stun, root, taunt, etc.)

6162.name: Fervor of Battle
description: Your attacks and spells grant stacks of Fervor for 5 seconds (max 10 stacks). Each stack adds 1-8 bonus physical damage to basic attacks against champions (based on your level)
sanitizedDescription: Your attacks and spells grant stacks of Fervor for 5 seconds (max 10 stacks). Each stack adds 1-8 bonus physical damage to basic attacks against champions (based on your level)

6161.name: Warlord's Bloodlust
description: Your critical strikes on enemy champions heal you for 15% of the damage dealt and grant you 20% attack speed for 4 seconds (2 second cooldown)
sanitizedDescription: Your critical strikes on enemy champions heal you for 15% of the damage dealt and grant you 20% attack speed for 4 seconds (2 second cooldown)

6164.name: Deathfire Touch
description:
Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take magic damage equal to 6 + 50% of your Bonus Attack Damage and 20% of your Ability Power, over 3 seconds

Area of effect and damage over time abilities apply half of this damage over 1.5 seconds instead
sanitizedDescription: Your damaging abilities cause enemy champions to take magic damage equal to 6 + 50% of your Bonus Attack Damage and 20% of your Ability Power, over 3 seconds Area of effect and damage over time abilities apply half of this damage over 1.5 seconds instead

6241.name: Insight
description: Reduces the cooldown of Summoner Spells by 15%
sanitizedDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Summoner Spells by 15%

6342.name: Bandit
description:
Gain 1 gold for each nearby minion killed by an ally.

Gain 3 gold (10 if melee) when hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack (5 second cooldown)
sanitizedDescription: Gain 1 gold for each nearby minion killed by an ally. Gain 3 gold (10 if melee) when hitting an enemy champion with a basic attack (5 second cooldown)

6242.name: Perseverance
description: +50% Base Health Regen, increased to +200% when below 25% Health
sanitizedDescription: +50% Base Health Regen, increased to +200% when below 25% Health

6321.name: Runic Affinity
description: Buffs from neutral monsters last 15% longer
sanitizedDescription: Buffs from neutral monsters last 15% longer

6322.name: Secret Stash
description:
Your Potions and Elixirs last 10% longer.

Your Health Potions are replaced with Biscuits that restore 20 Health and 10 Mana instantly on use
sanitizedDescription: Your Potions and Elixirs last 10% longer. Your Health Potions are replaced with Biscuits that restore 20 Health and 10 Mana instantly on use

6262.name: Strength of the Ages
description: Siege minions and large monsters that you or nearby allied champions kill grant 20 and 10 permanent Health, respectively (300 max). After reaching the max bonus, siege minion kills restore 100 Health
sanitizedDescription: Siege minions and large monsters that you or nearby allied champions kill grant 20 and 10 permanent Health, respectively (300 max). After reaching the max bonus, siege minion kills restore 100 Health

6263.name: Bond of Stone
description: +2% Damage Reduction. While near an allied champion, this bonus is quadrupled and 8% of the damage they would take from champions is dealt to you instead (cannot reduce you below 15% Health)
sanitizedDescription: +2% Damage Reduction. While near an allied champion, this bonus is quadrupled and 8% of the damage they would take from champions is dealt to you instead (cannot reduce you below 15% Health)

6343.name: Dangerous Game
description: Champion kills and assists restore 5% of your missing Health and Mana
sanitizedDescription: Champion kills and assists restore 5% of your missing Health and Mana
